text: Went there at 9pm for coffee after dinner. Very good offer and pricing. The service is very fast and we loved our latte and caramel macchiato.

Love that Luckin Coffee has dining area here so I can enjoy my coffee while editing videos. The staff was nice and smiling always. Must try the new Apple Fizzy Americano super the best!! Each sip delivers a burst of crisp apple flavour, blended with sparkling soda and Americano coffee notes. Take note it's packed with the goodness of 1.4 applesüçé (made with 3 varieties of apple) in every cup!

Follow Ochiebon (IG/Fb/YT/TT) for more detailed review. Thanks Luckin Coffee :)

sofa seats and bench seats available

no power plugs here

enjoyed the new pair hug latte but might not be enjoyable for all
Love the drink!! Though i tried to join as new member to get the promo but the app cannot work because my apple id is tied to Australia region - sad

An interesting corner for meetups outside the weekend, ie when not too crowded. You order on the APP and pickup at counter. But I think my friend managed to get a coffee without the APP. Note, the offers can be confusing.
